root.text: MCQ based on renewable resources. This round will involve basic and tricky questions which would test the participants knowledge on renewable resources and the current status of our Earth and its resources. Some questions will be straight forward while others would require logical thinking.

Each team in this round has to pick one topic from the bowl that has some of the recent renewable resources topics. A fixed time is allocated for the participants within the time the team has to prepare and come out with the best presentation that is possible. The team with a overall explanation of the selected topic is rewarded. As the time allocated for the preparation is limited the participants can make use of the internet for a better description of the topics chosen.

This event would allow the participants to show their ideas for a better future. The participants would be provided with chart paper and sketch pens. Within the allotted time they would have to describe their thoughts by drawing it.
